title: Through the looking glass
creator_credit: Jambre Productions and Burbank Animation Sydney (Jointly)
brief_description: Alice has fallen through her mirror into a wonderful place called Chessland! There Tom Fool, the plucky magician, introduces her to the eccentric White Queen. Alice wants to be Queen too! However, first she must travel across 8 crazy squares of Chessland hitching rides on flying horses and trains that swim.
